name: 目盲/Blind
description:
A watchman can drive away evil spirits and avoid ghosts.
As a child, you suffered from face blindness, and as a rare woman among watchmen, you returned to your hometown after four years of absence after graduating from college. The most urgent thing is to find a suitable job, perform your duties, and live a peaceful and stable life.
However, the development in the past went against my wishes. The sudden appearance of mysterious teenagers, the frequent abnormal phenomena, and the unexpected knowledge of blood relationship and life experience... All make you farther and farther away from the peaceful life you dream of.
Settle for the status quo or seek the truth? How to walk between the ordinary and the abnormal, and walk out of the narrow gap of the reality and fantasy, all depends on your choice





Jiang
"I lied to you... I said I was angry recently because I blushed when I saw you."
New year, dog, straight ball player
My childhood playmate left without warning and appeared without warning



Fang
"Stand here, don't move around. I'll go... I'll come as soon as I go."
At the beginning of the year, the cat is a reliable character with a black belly and can move easily
After four years of separation, it seems that something has changed



An
"You can say anything."
Cheerful, optimistic and gentle
My good friend from childhood to childhood also returned to Z City after graduation



>20+ dynamic CGs
>Complete CG appreciation mode and achievement system
>Simple and traditional Chinese, English and Japanese support
>Urban legend theme of suspense and mild horror
